requirements.summary: Create a landing page showcasing the Veebirstays property with listing details
acceptanceCriteria: Page includes property photos in a gallery or carousel
Page shows key property details (location, capacity, amenities)
Page is responsive and works on mobile and desktop

file_operations.description: Replace existing content with the Veebirstays landing page structure including hero section with property name, photo gallery/carousel, and key property details sections
Create a hero component displaying 'Veebirstays' property name and featuring the generated hero banner image at frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-property.dim_1920x800.png with responsive layout
Create a photo gallery or carousel component to display property photos with responsive grid layout for mobile and desktop
Create a component to display key property information including location, guest capacity, and amenities in an organized layout

requirements.summary: Display property amenities and features with visual indicators
acceptanceCriteria: Amenities are displayed in an organized, scannable format
Icons or visual indicators accompany each amenity

file_operations.description: Create an amenities section component displaying WiFi, kitchen facilities, and other amenities in a grid or list format using the generated amenity icons from frontend/public/assets/generated/amenities-icons.dim_600x400.png with clear labels

requirements.summary: Add booking call-to-action linking to Airbnb listing
acceptanceCriteria: Prominent booking button is visible on the page
Button links to the correct Airbnb listing URL
Button opens in a new tab

file_operations.description: Create a prominent call-to-action component with a button linking to https://www.airbnb.co.in/rooms/1582766952093298603 that opens in a new tab using target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer'
Wire the BookingCTA component into the landing page in a prominent position

requirements.summary: Create property details section with location and capacity information
acceptanceCriteria: Guest capacity and room details are shown
Information is easy to read and well-organized

file_operations.description: Create a component displaying location information, guest capacity, bedroom/bathroom count, and property type in a well-organized, easy-to-read format with clear hierarchy
Wire the PropertyInfo component into the landing page layout

requirements.summary: Implement warm, inviting design aesthetic with earthy tones and clean typography
acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses warm, welcoming tones
Overall design feels cohesive and inviting
Layout emphasizes property photos and key information

file_operations.description: Update global styles with warm color palette using CSS variables for terracotta, warm whites, and sage green tones, and configure clean, readable typography with appropriate font families and sizing
Extend Tailwind configuration with custom color palette including terracotta, warm white, and sage green colors, and configure typography settings for a professional, hospitality-focused aesthetic
